idea-plugin.name: CodeGlance
idea-plugin.description: Embeds a code mini-map similar to the one found in Sublime into the editor pane. Works with both light and dark themes using your customized colors for syntax highlighting.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1: - Made character weighting non random, removes the 'film grain' effect when rapidly updating a document.
1.0: Initial release of the plugin: - Worker thread for rendering - Color rendering using intelij's tokenizer - Scrollable! - Embedded into editor window
